predict_diagnosis:
1. Multiple system atrophy (MSA) - parkinsonian type
2. Progressive supranuclear palsy (PSP)
3. Corticobasal degeneration (CBD)
4. Frontotemporal lobar degeneration (FTLD) with parkinsonism
5. Dementia with Lewy bodies (DLB)
6. Parkinson's disease (PD) with cognitive impairment
7. Vascular parkinsonism (VP)
8. Essential tremor (ET) with parkinsonism
9. Hyperkinetic movement disorder (HDM)
10. Idiopathic Parkinson's disease (IPD) with complications
